amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate funding for the Economic Development Administration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 9 in the Congressional Record of July 16, 1996, to delete the $328 million appropriation in the bill to fund the Economic Development Administration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hostettler amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 99 - 328 (Roll no. 345).
